sick
Posted on May 27, 2004

i am sick. I stayed home today. the first time in quite awhile. I just was tired of waking up and feeling like hell. so I decided that rather than prolong the my cold I woudl just stay home. and sleep. I didn’t mean to sleep. but I slept. until 2. haha. rule.

i just ate lunch. food rules.
